issue_body: Implement fingerprint and face recognition for login.
Upgrade the application from desktop to a modern web application.
Send email reminders for upcoming appointments.
Allow users to export itineraries to PDF.
Create a step-by-step onboarding guide for new users.
Prevent abuse by limiting API requests.
Display daily motivational quotes to users.
Curate a library of useful Copilot prompts.
Include quizzes at the end of each lesson.
Show how to use Copilot CLI in workflows.
Track top scores for memory game.
Allow metrics export to CSV files.
Document best practices for agent design.
Map business apps to GitHub repositories.
Guide for setting up MCP server.
Provide examples for custom chat modes.
Implement user authentication for secure access.
Redesign the UI for better usability and accessibility.
Connect the app to a RESTful API for data management.
Enable users to search contacts by name or email.
Automate build and deployment using GitHub Actions.
Allow users to export contacts to CSV.
Enable import of contacts from CSV.
Enable users to add notes to contacts.
Send emails directly from the app.
Initiate phone calls from the app.
Send SMS messages from the app.
Log all user actions for auditing.
Enable import of contacts from Google.
Enable import of contacts from Outlook.
Allow export of contacts to PDF.
Allow export of contacts to Excel.
Enable bulk import from CSV files.
Enable bulk export to CSV files.
Allow users to add custom fields to contacts.
